MemoryInfobox.description: 'A Kephallonian priestess was desperate to find the Spear of Kephalos in hopes it would draw more people to her Temple of Zeus (Kephallonia)|shrine. Was it Kephalos, then, who sent Kassandra to help her?'

General_Description: '''In the Footsteps of Gods''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra met a priestess of [[Zeus]] who sought her aid to find the legendary [[Spear of Kephalos]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra came across a priestess at the [[Temple of Zeus, Kephallonia|Temple of Zeus]] near [[Sami]].
*'''Priestess:''' ''Mighty [[Kephalos]], I entreat you! Send us a champion! Someone worthy of your might spear! Help your priestess in her hour of need!''
Kassandra approached her.

<tabber>
|-|Your prayer is answered.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You called?''
|-|I can help instead.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the only one here. But maybe I can help you.''
</tabber>
[[File:ACO - In the Footsteps of Gods 2.png|thumb|240px|The priestess asking for Kassandra's help]]
The priestess turned around.
*'''Priestess:''' ''Oh! Oh... Kassandra. You startled me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Why are you looking for a champion?''
*'''Priestess:''' ''I need someone worthy to win the Spear of Kephalos! I've been deciphering some of the sanctuary's stone carvings. They say the spear was hidden in the [[Melissani Cave|caves]] beneath [[Kephallonia]] when the temple was built! You could get it for me, couldn't you? I can give you a reward!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If the spear is in the caves, I'll find it.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Well! Maybe you were sent by Kephalos!''
(If players choose "What is the spear of Kephalos?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Kephalos had a spear?''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Kassandra. Surely you've heard this story since you were a child.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I didn't have much time for stories.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Well. Perhaps you didn't. But you know Kephalos founded Kephallonia and started the line of [[Odysseus]]. His spear was a gift from the Gods. It was said never to miss its target. He must have hidden it in the caves after killing his [[Prokris|wife]] with it.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He threw a spear that wouldn't miss at his wife?''
*'''Priestess:''' ''He was hunting and heard her in the bushes. He thought she was a deer. It's a sad story.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Sounds dangerous.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Well, only if you throw it at someone!''
(If players choose "Why do you need the spear?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Why do you need a spear? Not thinking of becoming a soldier, are you?''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Of course not. But think how many people will come to the shrine if we have the Spear of Kephalos! With their donations, I could do so many things! Repair the sanctuary. Feed the hungry families in [[Sami]].''
(If players choose "How can I find it?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So where is the spear?''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Apparently it's hidden deep in the caves beneath Kephallonia. There's an entrance north of here; maybe you can try that way first.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's not much to go on.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''You have so little faith in the gods! If Kephalos means for us to have the spear, you will find it!''
(If players choose "That's all for now.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll see what I can find.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Oh, thank you. I'll prepare a spot in the sanctuary!''
[[File:ACOD_-_In_the_Footsteps_of_the_Gods_3.png|thumb|240px|Kassandra returned]]
Kassandra headed to the cave entrance north of the sanctuary. Entering through a small opening, she found a group of bandits within. After eliminating the bandits, she looted the spear in a chest and exited the cave, returning to the priestess.
*'''Priestess:''' ''Kassandra! Have you come back to talk about the spear?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I have.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Oh good! Tell me, did you find it?''

<tabber>
|-|Let's talk about my reward first.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You mentioned a reward.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''Oh. Of course! You've certainly earned it!''
|-|I'll give it to you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Consider it a donation to the temple.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''What, no reward? Oh, Kassandra, I'm in your debt. If ever there's a way my temple can help you – or anyone. Send them here. I will remember.''
|-|I couldn't find it.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I looked in the caves. The spear isn't there.''
*'''Priestess:''' ''I had hoped to revive the sanctuary. But... it is as Kephalos wills it.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the prietess to look for the spear. She either chose to hand over the spear, or keep it for herself.
